Summary: Multiple orb-ed object moving across the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsVery clear night sky. Cold. An object made up of four orbs moved across the night sky at approximately twice the speed of a typical aircraft. Object was estimated at about 10,000 feet. The orbs would pulsate in intensity (not flash) and change from green to red. About 7 times randomly, the entire object would flash a bright white for an instant. Object appeared to be twice as large as a passenger aircraft. It moved from approximately north to south and then turned to southwest at high speed. Object was observed until it disappeared over the horizon. Passenger aircraft were also in the night sky and had the standard running lights and strobes visible.
